projects.title: Portable Solar Cooker (Final Year Project)
projects.description: Designed and fabricated a portable solar cooker to provide a renewable and eco-friendly alternative for off-grid cooking.
projects.detailedDescription: Designed and fabricated a portable solar cooker to provide a renewable and eco-friendly alternative for off-grid cooking. The system focused on maximizing solar energy utilization, portability, and efficiency while maintaining affordability for rural households.

images.alt: CAD model of the portable solar cooker
images.caption: SolidWorks design of the parabolic reflector

images.alt: Fabricated prototype of the solar cooker
images.caption: Completed prototype during performance validation

projects.impact: Experimentally validated performance against conventional methods
challenges: Maintaining cooking efficiency under varying solar conditions
Reducing heat losses to improve performance
solutions: Optimized parabolic reflector and absorber plate design through CAD and CFD simulations
Selected lightweight yet durable materials for structure
Added thermal insulation to minimize energy loss
Experimentally validated performance compared to conventional cooking methods

projects.title: Automated Solid Waste Compacting & Packing Machine
projects.description: Developed a vertical hydraulic compactor integrated with an automatic stripping and binding mechanism to reduce waste volume and improve handling efficiency.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed a vertical hydraulic compactor integrated with an automatic stripping and binding mechanism to reduce waste volume and improve handling efficiency.

images.caption: SolidWorks model showing hydraulic press and binding system

images.alt: Close-up of the automated binding mechanism
images.caption: Detail of the automated stripping and binding mechanism

projects.impact: Improved waste handling efficiency by over 60%
challenges: Reducing waste volume significantly without material rebound
Synchronizing compaction, stripping, and binding processes
Ensuring operator safety and ease of use
solutions: Designed a vertical hydraulic press system for compacting
Developed automated binding and stripping mechanism for packaging
Integrated safety guards and emergency shutoff controls
